title: Tower and foundations
fullText:
The tower and foundations shall be designed and constructed to withstand the maximum expected wind loads in accordance with AS/NZS 1170.2.
The tower and foundations shall be designed and constructed to withstand the maximum expected loads from the wind turbine generator in accordance with the manufacturer's specifications.
The tower and foundations shall be designed and constructed to withstand the maximum expected loads from ice and snow in accordance with AS/NZS 1170.3.
The tower and foundations shall be designed and constructed to withstand the maximum expected loads from earthquakes in accordance with AS/NZS 1170.4.
The tower and foundations shall be designed and constructed to withstand the maximum expected loads from other environmental factors in accordance with AS/NZS 1170.1.
